bibl.title: The Amphora Wharf: The Context and Construction of Roman Amphora Installations.
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. Harbour varieties: Traditional construction techniques. - 2. Myos Hormos. - 3. Other examples of waterfront amphora installations. - 4. Conclusion.

bibl.title: Myos Hormos - Quseir al-Qadim. Roman and Islamic Ports on the Red Sea. Volume 2: The Finds from the Excavations 1999-2003

bibl.seg: Lucy Blue, The Amphora Wharf: The Context and Construction of Roman Amphora Installations.

David Peacock & Lucy Blue (edd.), assisted by Julian Whitewright, Myos Hormos - Quseir al-Qadim. Roman and Islamic ports on the Red Sea. Volume 2: The Finds from the Excavations 1999-2003 = University of Southampton. Series in Archaeology. 6 = BAR International Series. 2286 (Oxford, 2011) pp. 35-42, 6 figg.
Introduction. - 1. Harbour varieties: Traditional construction techniques. - 2. Myos Hormos. - 3. Other examples of waterfront amphora installations. - 4. Conclusion.
